WorkItem.ClosedComment: The problem is that you're doing an ajax call; PHPexcel will respond to the ajax call, but your callback can't then handle the file. This isn't an issue with PHPExcel, it's an issue with any ajax file handling
WorkItem.Description:
Now days, I am working with two .php files

The first call at second, (where I generate the file of Excel using phpexcel ) with $.ajax({ type: 'post'.....

But when I use the method POST the second PHP do not work fine. ( the page is blank).  
I was checking and the problem seems to be with the instruction "save('php://output');"  (never download the file) because I can download the file to my machine by example "save('/p.xlsx');" .  
It only occurs when I execute the second php called from other php, 
using the method POST ( I can call to second using href=.... and it runs well and download the file).  But I need to do it with POST..

I dont konw if the problem is that I should have other sentence

Please I need your help urgently
